DataElement.preferredName: Address Preference PCORnet CDM Indicator Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A standardized representation of the location of a person, business, building, or organization.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.:A standardized representation of the location of a person, business, building, or organization._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized representation of the location of a person, business, building, or organization.:The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The location at which an organization or person can be reached. (from American Heritage Dictionary)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

A standardized representation of the location of a person, business, building, or organization.
The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.
